name: Decisions (itch) (JethRow, Rodrigo Teodoro)
description:
Gameplay: 

The game made for 72Hour Mini Jam Held me up last 24h,try it!!Theme is fate, limitation - loosing is good, it is very enjoyable and i have worked so hard on it,like never before, my first game jam ever :)

run around or slide a sled ! 

WASD- MOVEMENT

IN SLED:

A- rotate left

D-rotate right

SPACE-thrust forward(Be gentle, its all about sliding casually)

G-flip sled(only when in sled)- (DONT ABUSE,  kinda buggy,will fix later)

F-Exit Sled

E-Enter Sled

ENJOY!

ESC-Reset level

MERRY CHRISTMAS AND HAPPY NEW YEAR! :)

-Updated the sledge , now much easier to control, but still ,dont over abuse gas pedal :)

-Quick explanation for the Demon mechanism, their speed and numerity, depends on the evil deeds you make 

Credits for music & sfx- Rodrigo Teodoro
